nl_query: Show me hotels in Bangkok that are pet-friendly and have a spa.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND spa = 1

nl_query: We need a cozy place in Phuket that's great for couples, meaning it should offer some privacy, either by beach or a water scenic view. Ideally, it has a romantic restaurant too.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND adults_only = 1 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR beach_access IN ('private beach')) AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND adults_only = 1 AND ocean_view = 1 AND restaurant = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND adults_only = 1 AND beach_access = 'private beach' AND restaurant = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND adults_only = 1 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR beach_access = 'private beach') AND restaurant = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND adults_only = 1 AND (beach_access = 'private beach' OR ocean_view = 1) AND restaurant = 1

nl_query: Find me a pet-friendly accommodation in Bangkok with a place for lifting weights.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1

nl_query: Looking for a family-oriented resort in Phuket that is welcoming to toddlers, offers a space for playing, and includes breakfast options for tiny but picky eaters.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND cribs = 1 AND playground = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND cribs = 1 AND playground = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 1

nl_query: I need a hotel in Osaka, after having seen the historic city I would like to be able to come home and relax, preferably with a massage. Being able to swim around a pool would be nice as well. I might get a car so parking at the hotel would be great too
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Osaka' AND spa = 1 AND pool = 1 AND parking != 'no';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Osaka' AND spa = 1 AND pool = 1 AND parking != 'no'

nl_query: Looking for a family-friendly stay in Phuket that promises a good night's sleep for our baby and allows us to prepare meals.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND cribs = 1 AND kitchen = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND cribs = 1 AND kitchen = 1

nl_query: Can you recommend a pet-friendly accommodation in Bangkok that also offers an airport shuttle service? Must be a nice hotel
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND airport_shuttle != 'no' AND stars >= 3;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND airport_shuttle != 'no' AND stars >= 3

nl_query: We're planning a summer getaway to Phuket with our little ones and are in need of a hotel near the sea that's friendly for tots needing cribs, with some fun water activities.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access') AND cribs = 1 AND (child_pool = 1 OR water_park = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access') AND cribs = 1 AND child_pool = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access') AND cribs = 1 AND water_park = 1

nl_query: I'm looking for a hotel in Bangkok with a stunning city view, preferably has a pool.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pool = 1

nl_query: Seeking a top quality and high-class stay in Phuket for our honeymoon, must be romantic with private beach or a view of the sea, plus a spot for my wife to pamper herself.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND stars = 5 AND (beach_access = 'private beach' OR ocean_view = 1) AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND stars = 5 AND (beach_access = 'private beach' OR ocean_view = 1) AND spa = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND stars = 5 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR beach_access = 'private beach') AND spa = 1
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND stars = 5 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR beach_access = 'private beach') AND spa = 1

nl_query: Find a pet-friendly accommodation in Bangkok that offers an airport shuttle.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND airport_shuttle != 'no';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND airport_shuttle != 'no'

nl_query: Looking for a cozy place to stay in Krabi that's great for backpackers, it must be cheap, must have lockers for belongings and a communal place to cook
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Krabi' AND stars <= 2 AND kitchen = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Krabi' AND stars <= 2 AND kitchen = 1

nl_query: Find me a hotel in Bangkok that's pet-friendly and has a pool.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bangkok' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND pool = 1

nl_query: Looking for a family-friendly stay in Phuket that welcomes our furry friend, offers a place for my morning workouts, and somewhere the kids can splash around.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1 AND (pool = 1 OR child_pool = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1 AND (pool = 1)
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1 AND (child_pool = 1)
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1 AND (pool = 1 OR child_pool = 1)
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Phuket' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND fitness_center = 1 AND (child_pool = 1 OR pool = 1)

nl_query: Show me hotels in Kanchanaburi that have a fitness center.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Kanchanaburi' AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Kanchanaburi' AND fitness_center = 1

nl_query: I'm looking for a place to stay in Koh Samui with free wifi and a view the water sorrounding the island
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Koh-Samui' AND wifi = 'free' AND ocean_view = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Koh-Samui' AND wifi = 'free' AND ocean_view = 1

nl_query: Seeking a cozy retreat in Chiang Mai that's my dog is allowed at and somewhere my 12 year old kid ones can enjoy a good splash.
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Chiang-Mai' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Chiang-Mai' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND pool = 1;

nl_query: I need a hotel in the historical city of Kyoto. They must not allow pets as I am allergic. Furthermore it must also have an in-house stove top as I want to practice making traditional dishes
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Kyoto' AND pet_friendly = 'no pets' AND kitchen = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Kyoto' AND pet_friendly = 'no pets' AND kitchen = 1

nl_query: Looking for a family-friendly place in Chiang Mai that's comfy during the hot season, preferably with a spot for us and our 13 and 11 year old kids to cool off and without charging extra for bringing our dog. It must also be at least a 3 star hotel
sql_queries: SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Chiang-Mai' AND aircondition = 1 AND pool = 1 AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND stars >= 3;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Chiang-Mai' AND aircondition = 1 AND pool = 1 AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND stars >= 3
